text:
Even in our wildest dreams, we can't imagine sitting and enjoying our favorite movie and suddenly seeing the star of the film popping up out of nowhere.
Twitter
But sometimes reality turns better than the dreams and that's what happened for the Captain marvel fans in New Jersey who were in the theaters to enjoy the film.
Reuters
Wearing a fantastic Captain Marvel jumpsuit, Brie Larson turned up for a surprise visit on Saturday.
Twitter
The pictures that shared by the official social media accounts of the movie has Larson sipping a soda from a cup with her own face on it.
She dropped by the AMC theater in Clifton Commons to surprise her fans!
#CaptainMarvel herself, @brielarson, popped in to theaters on Saturday night to surprise fans on opening weekend! #HigherFurtherFaster pic.twitter.com/TP7Nt8KkiE — Captain Marvel (@captainmarvel) March 10, 2019
Don't Miss 555 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
Talking to the audience that was full of die-hard fans, she said,
"I just heard that I was on the cups and popcorn and I wanted to see for myself."
From jumping behind the candy bar to serving up popcorn and soda, fans were visibly excited to meet their onscreen hero!
Just FYI, the film is running in the cinemas now and is doing an incredible business in both overseas and in India!
title: 'Captain Marvel' Fans Get An Epic Surprise, Brie Larson Crashes The Screening To Serve Popcorn!
